mapper.select: SELECT B.*,TM.NAME,SP.*,AP.*,PF.* FROM THORMEMBER TM JOIN BIDAMOUNT B ON TM.ID = B.ID JOIN SALEPRODUCT SP ON B.PRODUCTID = SP.PRODUCTID JOIN AUCTIONPRODUCT AP ON SP.PRODUCTNUM = AP.PRODUCTNUM JOIN PRODUCTFILES PF ON AP.PRODUCTNUM = PF.PRODUCTNUM WHERE TM.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY(PAYUID, ID, PAYTOTAL, PAYRESULT, PAYDATE, PAYMERCHANT) VALUES(#{payUid}, #{id}, #{payTotal}, #{payResult}, now(), #{payMerchant})
mapper.update: UPDATE THORMEMBER SET PW = #{pw}, EMAIL = #{email}, POST = #{post}, ADDR = #{addr}, ADDR2 = #{addr2}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE ID = #{id}
